bike.description: Specialized Ariel A1 Premium Aluminum double-butted frame, women's fitness geometry and tubesets, fender and rack braze-ons, forged dropouts, kickstand mount

Specialized Women's Body Geometry XCT, Kraton rubber w/ gel, closed end, 120mm, lock-on
Shimano BR-M446, hydraulic disc brake, 160mm rotor
Shimano BR-M446 hydraulic disc brake, 160mm rotor
Shimano FD-M430, top swing, dual pull
Cartridge bearing, square spindle w/ crank stop right side, capless bolts
FDP light alloy, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Disc hub, double-sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR, round disc mount
Disc hub, loose ball, double-sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 19mm contact side, QR
Specialized Women's Body Geometry Riva WMN Sport, steel rails, 155mm width
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, owner's manual
